attributes.action: Respond in public with a precise action plan to every petition over 20,000 signatures
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The commitment to 'respond' to each petition is too weak and leaves room for platitudes, unsubstantiated opinion and fluff (as you will know if you have ever written to a Minister). Any opinion shared by 20,000 people obliges a response which must be either a commitment to a precise action with a specific outcome by a specific date or a statement that no action will be taken.

PS - This e-petitions website is an excellent idea.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
